# SHOEGAME - Shoe Business Website

This is a modern e-commerce website for a shoe business built with Next.js, React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

## Project Overview

A full-featured shoe business website with:
- Product catalog and listing
- Individual product detail pages
- Shopping cart functionality
- Responsive design
- Modern UI with Tailwind CSS
- TypeScript for type safety

## Development Notes

- Framework: Next.js 14+
- Styling: Tailwind CSS
- State Management: React Context API for cart
- Database: Mock data (can be extended with real backend)
- Deployment Ready: Vercel-optimized
